Keys.Name: TakeAllKeyBind
Keys.Description: Type a single character or a Unity KeyCode in this box.

Keys.Name: ShowTakeAllInventoryButton
Keys.Description: Shows a clickable Take All button in the inventory screen.

Keys.Name: ShowTakeAllConfirmationPopupForWagon
Keys.Description: Shows a confirmation popup when the player attempts to do a Take All action to prevent accidental transfers.

Keys.Name: ShowPopupWhenTakeAllFailedToTakeEverything
Keys.Description: Shows a disclaimer popup when the take all action couldn't carry over all the items due to player encumberance.
